text: Saint-Laurent-les-Bains-Laval-d'Aurelle is a commune of the Ardèche department, in the southern part of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Saint-Laurent-les-Bains (the seat) and Laval-d'Aurelle.Arrêté préfectoral 29 October 2018 == References == Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Ardèche
title: Saint-Laurent-les-Bains-Laval-d'Aurelle
